title: There is no refund in the new version（6.10.16）
body: Where can I refund champion? The purchase is not in store anymore.

replies.body: on a side note, what;s the difference between a cog, or a gear, or a sprocket?

Not really getting what you mean by " On the left side of the screen you should see an option for purchase history" and Which cog are you talking about , is it the one that opens the preferences or something else.

Thanks for your time .
Go to the left with the bar down the client then u will see a small settings icon with a persone after clicking it go to the history thats it .
